title: Influence of Drug-Polymer Interactions on Release Kinetics of PLGA and PLA/PET Nanoparticles
summary: The study investigates how drug-polymer interactions affect release kinetics in poly(lactic-co-glycolic acid) (PLGA) and polylactide-co-ethylene glycol (PLA/PEG) nanoparticles, highlighting their potential as antimicrobial drug delivery systems.
methods: Microfluidic-based synthesis of nano-sized carriers for drug delivery systems (NDDS), precise control over nanocarrier characteristics, encapsulation efficiency improvement.
results: Release kinetics of PLGA nanoparticles were significantly influenced by drug-polymer interactions compared to PLA/PEG nanoparticles.

references.title: Front. Bioeng. Biotechnol.
